sources.title: Idaho
sources.description: The story concerns a respected judge (Harry Shannon) who is trying to clean up a saloon run by the notorious Belle Bonner (Ona Munson). Belle has discovered some secrets about the judge's past, and she has her brutish accomplices try to frame the judge for some of their own crimes. Deputy Roy Rogers trusts the judge, but his boss does not, setting up a fast-paced if mostly predictable story.

sources.title: Idaho (1943) ROY ROGERS
sources.description:
Stars: Roy Rogers, Smiley Burnette, Sons of the Pioneers
Director: Joseph Kane

A deputy sets out to prove that a respected judge, who had once been a criminal, is being framed for crimes committed by a crooked saloon owner.

sources.title: Last Seen In Idaho | Full Movie | Action Crime | Casper Van Dien | Shawn Christian
sources.description:
Last Seen In Idaho - A woman awakens from a coma after a car accident and begins having shocking visions of her future murder. It's a race against the clock as she tries to solve and prevent her own murder.
2018.  Stars: Hallie Shepherd, Casper Van Dien, Wes Ramsey

metadata.Plot: Ex-outlaw Grey is now a respected judge out to close down Belle's saloon. Duke and Spike, who knew Grey when he was a criminal, arrive and team up with Belle. When Belle's threat to reveal Grey's past fails, Duke and Spike hold up the bank and frame Grey. Roy now sets a trap for the outlaws.
metadata.Actors: Roy Rogers, Smiley Burnette, Bob Nolan
